Welcome to MovieBot’s documentation!¶

The Movie Bot¶

This Slack bot allows you to search for informations about movies and actors. The informations come from The Movie Data Base.

Movies¶

The Movie Bot can show you informations about a movie by sending him:

@<bot_name>: movie "title of movie"

The bot’s response is a list of several results. Each result contains :

  • Title - Release_date - Vote_average
  • Overview
  • Poster

Actors¶

To show informations about a actor, send him a message like this:

@<bot_name>: person "actor name"

The bot’s response is a list of actors :

  • Name - Popularity
  • List of films

Submodule¶

moviebot.api¶

Ensures communication with Slack Web Api .

moviebot.api.api_call(method, data, file, token)¶

Perform an API call to Slack.

Parameters:
  • method – (str) Slack API method name.
  • data – (dict) Form data to be sent.
  • file – (file) file pointer to send (for files.upload).
  • token – (str) token for identify the bot in Slack

moviebot.bot¶

Movie Bot : a Slack bot using asyncio

class moviebot.bot.MovieBot(token, api_key)¶

Bases: object

connect()¶

Joins Slack.

help(channel_id, team_id, query)¶

Help message.

Show the bot’s help message.

Parameters:
  • channel_id – (int) ID of Slack’s channel
  • team_id – (int) ID of Team in Slack
  • query – (str) Search term
parseFilm(data)¶

Parses the response of The Movie Data Base when search a movie.

The answer from TMDB is a list of dict. Each dict contains informations about one movie. This method prepares the dict to be sent to Slack.

Parameters:data – (dict) The data from TMDB
Return movieMsg:
 (list) Parsed message
receive(message)¶

Receives message from Slack.

Parameters:message – (json) Message from Slack
requestApiTmdb(type, query)¶

Makes a request to The Movie Data Base API.

Parameters:
  • type – (str) Type of request (movie, serie, actor)
  • query – (str) Search term
Return data:

(list) The results of request
searchMovie(query)¶

Search a movie.

Receive the answer from TMDB, parses it and send it (via method ‘send()’) to Slack

Parameters:query – (str) Search term
searchPerson(channel_id, team_id, query)¶

Search a person.

Receive the answer from TMDB, parses it and send it to Slack.

Parameters:
  • channel_id – (int) ID of Slack’s channel
  • team_id – (int) ID of Team in Slack
  • query – (str) Search term
send(message, channel_id, team_id, isAttachment)¶

Sends message to Slack.

Parameters:
  • message – (str) The message to send
  • channel_id – (int) ID of Slack’s channel
  • team_id – (int) ID of Team in Slack
  • isAttachment – (boolean) If attachment exist is true, false otherwise

moviebot.config¶

Global configuration and other magic numbers.

The minimal requirements :
  • Slack API Token
  • TMDB API Key
